members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportModule implements the IPortable ImportModule Interface
The Id of the module to be imported The content to be imported The version of the module to be imported The Id of the user performing the import -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo
member.summary: A single instance of the AttachmentInfo Object.
member.remarks: Added by Skeel

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.FormatBytes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Formats an integer value presumed as bytes to bytes/KB/MB/GB

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.AttachmentID
member.summary: The PK AttachmentID associated with the file.

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.FileID
member.remarks: All attachments must be part of the DNN File system.

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.PostID
member.summary: The PostID the attachment is associated with.

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.UserID
member.summary: UserID - we need this to collect "lost" attachments

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.LocalFileName
member.summary: LocalFileName - Used for the user to identify the file uploaded

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.FileName
member.summary: FileName - Actual FileName from DNN Files (generated through the GUID model)

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.Extension
member.summary: Extension - We use this display either image or link depending of extension

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.Inline
member.summary: Inline will return true, if the attachment is to be placed inline the postbody

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.Width
member.summary: Width (Will only apply for image files)

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate.Components.AttachmentInfo.Height
member.summary: Height (Will only apply for image files)
